s.text: Date: Wed, 26 Jan 2011 05:29:31 -0600 (CST) From: "Dr Paul O. Williams" <drwilliamspaul@att.net> Reply-To: "Dr Paul O. Williams" <drwilliamspaul@att.net> To: xxx@xxx.xxx Subject: NOTE: INTERESTED BUYERS ONLY

BUYER MUST ARRIVE IN GHANA TO SIGN ALL BUSINESS AND LEGAL DOCUMENTS IN RESPECT OF THE TRANSACTION, AND ALSO USE THE CHANCE TO INTERACT WITH MANAGEMENT AND THE VILLAGERS, AND PHYSICALLY ASCERTAIN THE PRODUCT.
